column4: I'm looking for  someone who has a very basic (if not fresh) installation of Ubuntu with all repositories enabled to help me test a script. Does anyone meet the criteria?
Alright, I will Private Message you in a minute, Laderius.
I've got a month old install; what kind of script is it?
Neat. I'm curious as to what extra options are there that you need to compile the package with. pm me. Sounds interesting.
